The photo was published on a Pakistan: based Facebook page on December 24, 2019 and has been shared over 40 times.
The caption of the Facebook post claims: 3. The same photo has been shared multiple times on Facebook with similar claims.
The authenticity of the claim is debunke: who published the photo in 2014 as part of a photo series dedicated to the 70th anniversary of the Great Victory. The photo was not taken in 1944 and the story about the German orphan is not true.
